1.title: The Butterfly Resort
1.plot: Visit some of the "treasures" of Bolivia, South America. This show seeks to celebrate the individuals and places of this beautiful South American country. In this episode, explore Biocentro Güempé, the "butterfly" resort outside of Santa Cruz, as Jacqueline tours this beautiful tropical resort and gets hands on experience with the many birds, animals and insects.

3.title: Civilizations Present and Past
3.plot: In this episode travel with Jacqueline into the foothills of the majestic Andes Mountains to explore some Inca ruins. This historic site of a past civilization has yet to be fully excavated. Then off to the "Chaco" of southwestern Bolivia to visit the Guarani, an indigenous people group where the hard work and dedication of one man has ensured the preservation of this tribal language.

5.title: Christmas on the Streets
5.plot: Visit some of the "treasures" of Bolivia, South America. In this episode, the granddaughter of the man who helped to ensure the preservation of the Guarani indigenous people, is helping to change the lives of kids on the streets of Santa Cruz. Jacqueline visits El Jordan, a resource center for street kids, where a special Christmas meal is prepared and served to as many as 5000 homeless kids.

imdb.title: Bolivia: Treasures Within
synopsis: Bolivia: Treasures Within is a reality travel TV show in which a Canadian woman seeks to help viewers discover the beautiful country of Bolivia, South America. Through a combination of adventures and entertaining interviews with a variety of locals, Jacqueline, the host, seeks out normal and not so normal tourist attractions to provide viewers with tips about where to go and what to watch for when touring this South American country. Jacquelines colorful personality is complemented by an adventurous attitude and her willingness to try anything new even if it looks unappealing.
